background: Leads HRT’s documentary programming. Focuses on public interest films that explore Croatian history, culture, politics, and contemporary social relevance.
thematic_priorities: Croatian national history and cultural heritage
Post-war identity, EU integration and regional development
Contemporary social issues and human interest stories
content_not_wanted: Projects without Croatian or regional relevance
budget_parameters: Range: €10K–€70K per hour Higher for co-productions
submission_process: Proposal in Croatian/English with topic summary
name: Mislav Togonal
